subject: Parachutes and Parachute Jumping
Deaths (Obituaries)
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Mr. Richard was a veteran BASE jumper and the husband of the rock climber Steph Davis who estimated last year that he had performed 2,000 BASE jumps and 7,000 sky dives.
snippet: Mr. Richard was a veteran BASE jumper and the husband of the rock climber Steph Davis who estimated last year that he had performed 2,000 BASE jumps and 7,000 sky dives.
